title: tour: infinite loop example, after switching page 'Kill' button cannot be accessed
body:
Context: http://127.0.0.1:3999/flowcontrol/4

When running example locally process time constraint is removed so infinite loop will happily chug along and can be killed using the button on page:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1690934/12457181/214ef2b0-bf9b-11e5-963a-a7617c57b4bc.png)

However after switching pages the context is lost, program is still running and must be killed manually.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1690934/12457210/3d6d9c94-bf9b-11e5-8077-46af7beab6ef.png)
